author: jim
msg: PR56832 -- mod_ratelimit reports at ERROR level everytime a lower-level filter
encounters an error. Since the core output filter only emits TRACE1, a higher
level filter shouldn't log the same condition as ERROR.

author: stsp
msg: On the log-message-templates branch, fix several crashes.

author: jim

msg: Rename module name in doxygen + partly revert r832442 which skipped doxygen doc generation for 'mod_watchdog.h'
